introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nano Banana
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Nano Banana is a revolutionary AI-powered image generation and editing platform that delivers consistent character editing and scene preservation. Unlike traditional text-to-image models, Nano Banana performs in-context image generation, allowing you to prompt with both text and images while seamlessly extracting and modifying visual concepts.

items.title: In-Context Image Generation
items.description: Nano Banana combines text and image inputs for seamless visual concept extraction and modification, delivering coherent renderings every time.

items.title: Character Consistency
items.description: Nano Banana preserves unique elements like reference characters or objects across multiple scenes and environments with unmatched accuracy.

items.title: Local Editing Precision
items.description: Make targeted modifications of specific elements with Nano Banana without affecting the rest of your image, enabling flexible instant editing.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Nano Banana
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Experience next-generation AI image editing with Nano Banana's revolutionary technology that surpasses Flux Kontext in every way.

items.title: Superior Performance
items.description: Nano Banana delivers faster inference speeds and higher quality results than competing models, with state-of-the-art character consistency and context understanding.

items.title: Iterative Editing Mastery
items.description: With Nano Banana, build upon previous edits through multiple turns while maintaining characters, identities, styles, and distinctive features across different scenes.

items.title: Style Reference Innovation
items.description: Nano Banana generates novel scenes while preserving unique styles from reference images, directed by simple text prompts with minimal latency.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Create with Nano Banana
usage.description: Transform your creative workflow with Nano Banana in three simple steps:

items.title: Start with Nano Banana
items.description: Begin your creative journey with Nano Banana by uploading your reference image or starting with a text prompt for instant generation.

items.title: Edit with Nano Banana
items.description: Use Nano Banana's powerful text instructions to modify your images - change expressions, add objects, or transform entire scenes seamlessly.

items.title: Iterate with Nano Banana
items.description: Build upon previous edits with Nano Banana's iterative capabilities, refining your creation step-by-step while preserving character consistency.

items.title: Perfect with Nano Banana
items.description: Achieve your desired result with Nano Banana's precision editing - from local adjustments to complete scene transformations in minimal time.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Core Capabilities of Nano Banana
feature.description: Experience the most advanced AI image editing technology with Nano Banana's breakthrough features.

items.title: Multimodal Flow Model
items.description: Nano Banana combines state-of-the-art character consistency, context understanding and local editing capabilities with strong text-to-image synthesis.

items.title: Interactive Speed Technology
items.description: Nano Banana delivers minimal latency for both image generation and editing, operating up to 8x faster than current leading models.

items.title: Text-Based Image Editing
items.description: Nano Banana enables flexible instant image editing through simple text instructions - no need for complex editing workflows or fine-tuning.

items.title: Photorealistic Rendering
items.description: Nano Banana provides strong prompt following, photorealistic rendering, and competitive typography with signature quality output.

items.title: Scene Transformation
items.description: Nano Banana handles complex transformations of entire scenes while maintaining visual coherence and character consistency across viewpoints.

items.title: Quality Preservation
items.description: Nano Banana maintains image quality and character consistency through iterative editing sessions, preserving distinctive features seamlessly.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Nano Banana
faq.description: Have more questions about Nano Banana? Contact our support team for assistance.

items.title: What exactly is Nano Banana and how does it work?
items.description: Nano Banana is a revolutionary AI-powered image generation and editing platform that performs in-context image generation. Unlike traditional text-to-image models, Nano Banana combines text and image inputs for seamless visual concept extraction and modification, delivering consistent character editing and scene preservation.

items.title: How is Nano Banana different from Flux Kontext?
items.description: Nano Banana surpasses Flux Kontext with superior performance, faster inference speeds (up to 8x faster), and enhanced character consistency. Nano Banana delivers better local editing precision, improved iterative editing capabilities, and maintains higher image quality throughout multiple editing sessions.

items.title: What types of editing can I do with Nano Banana?
items.description: Nano Banana supports comprehensive image editing including character consistency preservation, local editing of specific elements, style reference generation, scene transformation, and iterative editing. You can modify expressions, add objects, change backgrounds, or transform entire scenes with simple text prompts.

items.title: How fast is Nano Banana compared to other AI models?
items.description: Nano Banana operates with minimal latency, delivering results up to 8x faster than current leading models. The interactive speed technology ensures both image generation and editing happen in real-time, making Nano Banana perfect for rapid creative workflows and iterative design processes.

items.title: Can Nano Banana maintain character consistency across multiple edits?
items.description: Yes! Nano Banana excels at character consistency, preserving unique elements like reference characters or objects across multiple scenes and environments. The advanced multimodal flow model ensures that distinctive features remain consistent through iterative editing sessions.

items.title: Is Nano Banana suitable for professional creative work?
items.description: Absolutely! Nano Banana is designed for professional creatives, offering photorealistic rendering, competitive typography, and production-quality results. Many professional artists, designers, content creators, and creative agencies rely on Nano Banana for their daily workflows and client projects.
